laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial blood glucose was 180 mg/dL; repeated blood sugar was 170 mg/dL; subsequent low blood sugar was 40 mg/dL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood glucose decreased from 180 mg/dL to 170 mg/dL, then dropped to 40 mg/dL before admission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: A1c was 8.5%; later noted to be unchanged at 8%.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A1c remained stable at 8.5% for some time, then decreased slightly to 8%.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Creatinine level was 1.2 mg/dL upon admission; previous level was 0.9 mg/dL; increased to 2.0 mg/dL postoperatively.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Creatinine increased from 0.9 mg/dL to 1.2 mg/dL, then further increased to 2.0 mg/dL.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial blood pressure was 150/96 mm Hg; systolic pressure remained in the 150-160 mm Hg range; both systolic and diastolic blood pressure dropped to 80 mm Hg and undetectable, respectively, before admission.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood pressure persisted in the 150-160 mm Hg range, then dropped drastically before admission.
